Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/products/1901214366557667328/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Best Product Description for your website"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/products/1901214366557667328/)_"
---
[TARGETLANGUAGE] English
[PROMPT]
Keywords: [Keyword 1], [Keyword 2], [Keyword 3], [Keyword 4]
Size: [Describe size or dimensions]
Material: Crafted from [Material], offering [Description of material properties]
Handcrafted Nature: Dive into the intricate details shaped without machine intervention, showcasing [highlighted detailed craftsmanship]
Secure Delivery: Ensuring your [Product Name] reaches you securely and intact
Best Use: This [Product Name] shines in [Best place to use the product], elevating [Purpose of the product]
The product description should be 150 words in length.
which will include all the data above. Don't forget to add the brand name and keywords provided in it.
dont use repetitive sentences.
PromptHint: Add Keywords and Product Details that you want product description for
